DPSRU Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 16 Assistant Professor and Other Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 25, 2025, 13:02 IST
 National Institute of Pharmaceutical Education and Research
 16 Jobs |  Posted On : 25-Aug-2025 |  Delhi |  Salary : 50,000 to 89,435




FOLLOW

Delhi Pharmaceutical Sciences and Research University (DPSRU) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the 16 vacancies for Assistant Professor and Guest Faculty Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in Any Degree, post-graduation, BDS, MBBS, DNB, M.Pharm, B.Pharm, M.Sc, MBA, Ph.D can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the interview along with the relevant documents to the address mentioned below. Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the DPSRU Recruitment 2025. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Delhi.

DPSRU Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Assistant Professor	07	Any Degree, Post Graduation, BDS, MBBS, DNB, M.Pharm, B.Pharm, M.Sc, MBA, Ph.D
 Guest Faculty	09

Age Limit for the DPSRU Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years

Selection Process for the DPSRU Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the DPSRU Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 50,000 /- per month
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 89,435 /- per month.

Application fee for the DPSRU Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the DPSRU Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Assistant Professor Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Then, attend the walk-in interview along with the relevant documents at the address mentioned in the official notification.

Important Dates

Start Date of Interview	18-08-2025
Last Date of Interview	02-09-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
